description:
create the resporent site 
restorent name is : Apna Dhaba

pages.name: home
pages.purpose: Serve as the main landing page, showcasing Apna Dhaba's ambiance, popular dishes, and inviting customers to explore more.

pages.name: menu
pages.purpose: Display the full range of food and drink offerings, categorized for easy navigation and selection.

pages.name: blog
pages.purpose: Share stories, recipes, news, and insights about Indian cuisine and Apna Dhaba to engage customers.

pages.name: contact
pages.purpose: Provide all necessary information for customers to get in touch, make reservations, or find the restaurant.

styling.font_family: Montserrat (sans-serif) for body, Playfair Display (serif) for headings
